/-- Suppose (e1,...,em) is an orthonormal list of vectors in E. Let v : E.
    Then â€–vâ€–^2 = âˆ‘ |âŸªv, e_iâŸ«|^2 iff v âˆˆ span (range e). -/
theorem Axler_exercise_6_13 {m : â„•} (e : Fin m â†’ E) (v : E) (h : Orthonormal ğ•œ e) :
  (â€–vâ€– ^ 2 = âˆ‘ i : Fin m, â€–(âŸªv, e iâŸ« : ğ•œ)â€– ^ 2) â†” v âˆˆ Submodule.span ğ•œ (Set.range e) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {E : Type _} [InnerProductSpace â„ E]

open Set Submodule

/-- Suppose (e1,...,em) is an orthonormal list of vectors in E. Let v : E.
    Then â€–vâ€–^2 = âˆ‘ (inner v (e_i))^2 iff v âˆˆ span (range e). -/
theorem Axler_exercise_6_13 (m : â„•) (e : Fin m â†’ E) (v : E) (h : Orthonormal â„ e) :
  (â€–vâ€– ^ 2 = âˆ‘ i : Fin m, (inner â„ v (e i)) ^ 2) â†” v âˆˆ Submodule.span â„ (Set.range e) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable {ğ•œ : Type*} [RCLike ğ•œ]
variable {E : Type*} [SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [InnerProductSpace ğ•œ E]

open Set Submodule

theorem Axler_exercise_6_13 {m : â„•} (e : Fin m â†’ E) (v : E) (h : Orthonormal ğ•œ e) :
  (â€–vâ€– ^ 2 = âˆ‘ i : Fin m, (norm (inner ğ•œ v (e i))) ^ 2) â†” v âˆˆ span ğ•œ (range e) := by sorry
